name: A patchwork coat of skins
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has awesome armour class for its type (excellent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'animal lore'.
The coat is the bane of all outworld beasts.
